alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 01 at 4:50PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Washington and northeastern Adams Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 449 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southeast of Shamrock, or 29 miles south of Fort Morgan, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodrow and Shamrock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Washington County
